experience.responsibilities: Assisted senior actuaries with data cleaning and preparation for annual rate filing using SQL. Performed sensitivity analysis on pricing models and updated quarterly reporting templates in Microsoft Excel.

Provided academic support to undergraduate students in Calculus III and Probability Theory. Facilitated weekly review sessions focused on problem-solving techniques relevant to actuarial science fundamentals.
Managed front-end operations and coordinated staff scheduling. Handled high-volume transactions and resolved complex customer inquiries in a fast-paced retail environment.
